column1:
body {
        padding: 0px;    
    }
    #container {
        position: absolute;
        margin: 0px;
        padding: 0px;
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;  
    }
    .box {
        position: absolute;
        width: 50%;
        height: 300px;
        line-height: 300px;
        font-size: 50px;
        text-align: center;
        border: 2px solid black;
        left: 150%;
        top: 100px;
        margin-left: -25%;
    }
    #box1 {
        background-color: green;
        left: 50%;
    }
    #box2 {
        background-color: yellow;
    }
    #box3 {
        background-color: red;
    }
    #box4 {
        background-color: orange;
    }
    #box5 {
        background-color: blue;
    }
